title: Can't Get In To A Game. Need Help.
body: Hi, I need serious help. Today I logged onto  league and I noticed my client was being a lot slower then usual then I tried to play a game. I hit accept then I went from the main page to a black screen. Then after probaly 30 seconds then it puts me inn the picking phase. I pick my champion and lock then it goes from picking to the loading screen. It was a bunch of empty portraits that all said not connected. It wouldent let me alt tab out of it it wouldent let me task manager it wouldent let me do anything. I waited for a good 7 minutes then I was put into the after game lobby and it said I left the game and got a leave in the match history Leaver (Remake). I reset my pc then tried to get in game but this time it was a black screen for all of picking so i doged. I dont know what to do please help I have 5 days to get gold and I need my league to work.

replies.body: The black screen and issue you're explaining indicates that you could be having serious networks issues failing to connect or download any assets from the game server.  Your best bet is to give the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to get this fixed up.  Make sure to go over each step, and test it out in a custom game to prevent penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions.
